conbody.p: This tutorial describes how to release 3GP Parser resources.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: When you have finished using the 3GP Parser, you must release all associated resources. The purpose of this tutorial is to show you how to complete the parsing process.
The 3GP Library Overview introduces the 3GP Parser.

Use the C3GPParse::Complete() function to release 3GP Parser resources. If you want to reuse the 3GP Parser, you can open another file or buffer by calling one of the C3GPParse::Open() functions. If you no longer require the 3GP Parser, you can destroy the C3GPParse instance after calling C3GPParse::Complete().

section.title: Using Complete()
section.p: The following task is covered in this tutorial:

li.p: To reuse the 3GP Parser object after C3GPParse::Complete(), call one of the C3GPParse::Open() functions. For more information, see Initialising a 3GP Parser for reading 3GP, 3G2 or MP4 data.
